alert.note: Alert for Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Northern Wasatch Front (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 30 at 6:56PM MST until January 31 at 10:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills expected. For Eastern Box Elder County and the northern Wasatch Front, wind chills from 10 below to 20 below zero, coldest near Tremonton. For the Cache Valley, wind chills as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...Eastern Box Elder County, Northern Wasatch Front and Cache Valley/Utah Portion. * WHEN...Until 10 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Northern Wasatch Front
